headline: Adobe Produces Strong FCF - ADBE Stock Could Be Over 20% Too Cheap
summary: Adobe, Inc. produced strong free cash flow for its fiscal Q3 ending Aug. 29, but ADBE stock is down. Assuming it can generate 41% free cash flow (FCF) margins over the next year, ADBE stock could be over 20% too cheap.
